column5: All i can say is MAN I CAN'T WAIT TO TRY 'EM !!! If i was a muskie, i would eat nothing else but HandleBarz Lures. The pictures dont do them justice.Well made and colorful.Thanks Mike i will try them all next season after i outfit myself with the equipment i need to hunt MUSKIE properly.I'm going to bring one as a sample to a few local shops and see if i can get a few contacts for ya. Thanks a million buddy.  Paul

Not a problem at all Paul just a thank you for helping me along here also. Thanks for the goodies you had sent my way I will be putting them to good use the screwdriver is already in my work box and will come in handy.  Cheers and hope you have a great christmas
I need to let mine out for a swim! You wanna hook up Saturday, Mike? I've got some goodies for you also. If we don't hook up, I'll drop 'em in the mail for ya.
Brian it doe not look good right now but if I can get some one to watch the boy then I would love to get out I hope to hit the Detroit river on Sunday if that wind is from the right direction
Well, not sure if the wind will cooperate for Sunday. Hopefully the forcast will swing in our favour. We'll keep in touch.
